channel.title: Ground Textures
channel.description: Hi. I just started working on a server, with a bit of Java background, but I have some trouble. I am using a source that has a Deltascape Client Base. I chose to use a starters Delta client, but the person who put it up made all of the outdoor ground snowey, and the mini map aswell. I understand that I should use something called "Tom's Cache Editor". I just don't understand what to do with it. Also, how would I change the textures of local areas such as the floors of shops, banks, dungeons, etc.

item.title: Ground Textures
item.dc:creator: @QuigMon QuigMon
item.description:
@QuigMon wrote:

Sorry, that didn’t help. Some of those were missing and none of the others had the answer to the question. Can anyone help?

Read full topic

item.title: Ground Textures
item.dc:creator: @Diamond_Pk Diamond Pk
item.description:
@Diamond_Pk wrote:

look up in the search bar “cache not hd” and click on first one

Read full topic
